com.tumblr.backboard.imitator

Class MotionImitator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.Imitator
      • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.EventImitator
        • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.MotionImitator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstrainedMotionImitator

    public class MotionImitator
extends EventImitator
    Maps a user's motion to a View via a Spring.

    Created by ericleong on 5/13/14.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected float mDownPosition
      Used internally to keep track of the initial down position.
      protected float mOffset
      The offset between the view left/right location and the desired "center" of the view.
      protected MotionProperty mProperty
      The motion property to imitate.

      • MotionImitator

        public MotionImitator(MotionProperty property,
              int trackStrategy,
              int followStrategy)
        Constructor. It is necessary to call Imitator.setSpring(Spring) to set the spring.
        Parameters:
        property - the property to track.
        trackStrategy - the tracking strategy.
        followStrategy - the follow strategy.

      • MotionImitator

      • mapToSpring

        protected double mapToSpring(float motionValue)
        Specified by:
        mapToSpring in class Imitator
        Parameters:
        motionValue - Maps the value we are tracking to the value of the spring.
        Returns:
        the new end value of the spring. If set to Imitator.FOLLOW_EXACT, it is also the current value of the spring.
